    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(Object listener)
        Registers the given object as an event listener.

        Every method that is a listener method in this class must have the Listener annotation and exactly one parameter with type BaseEvent or a subclass of it. When an event that is assignable to the type of the parameter is called, then the method is invoked with the event as the argument.

        Parameters:
        listener - The event listener object

      • call

        public static void call(BaseEvent event)
        Calls an event.

        All event listener methods, whose argument is of a type the given event can be assigned from, are invoked.

        Parameters:
        event - The event
